Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.ObservableSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player extends ObservableSubject
Represents a player of the game containing every component related to him, like playerboard, choices and assistant deck

  • Method Details

    • setAssistants

      public void setAssistants(List<Assistant> assistants)
      gives the player all the references to the assistants shared by every player in the game
      Parameters:
      assistants - a list of Assistant created by the game and given to every player

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Gets the nickaname of the player
      Returns:
      The nickname of the player

    • playAssistant

      public boolean playAssistant(Assistant assistant)
      If the specified assistant is playable in the current turn this method sets the priority and the max mother nature moves of the player and removes the assistant from the player hand.
      Parameters:
      assistant - the assistant to play
      Returns:
      true if the assistant is playable false if the assistant is not playable

    • moveStudentToDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentToDiningRoom(Color student)
      Adds a new student to the dining room of the player
      Parameters:
      student - the color of the student to add

    • addStudentFromCloud

      public void addStudentFromCloud(Cloud chosenCloud, int cloudID)
      Moves every student from a cloud to the player entrance
      Parameters:
      chosenCloud - The cloud from which the students are taken
      cloudID - The id of the cloud from which the students are taken

    • getPlayerHand

      public PlayerHand getPlayerHand()

      Returns:
      the PlayerHand of the player

    • setPlayerPriority

      public void setPlayerPriority(int newPriority)
      Sets the priotity of the player in the action phase.
      Parameters:
      newPriority - numbeber of priority contained on the assistant played during the pianification phase

    • getPlayerPriority

      public int getPlayerPriority()
      Gets the priority of the player in the current round
      Returns:
      an integer corresponding to the priority of the last assistan player

    • setMotherNatureMaxMove

      public void setMotherNatureMaxMove(int MotherNatureMaxMove)
      Sets the max movements of mother nature the player can make in the action phase.
      Parameters:
      MotherNatureMaxMove - number of mother nature moves contained on the assistant played during the pianification phase

    • useCoins

      public void useCoins(int payment)
      Remove from the player the specified number of coins if he has enough. Otherwise it do nothing.
      Parameters:
      payment - number of coins to take

    • isEnoughCoin

      private boolean isEnoughCoin(int coinRequired)
      Tells if the player has more or equals coins than the specified number
      Parameters:
      coinRequired - number of coins to compare with the player coins
      Returns:
      true if the player has enough coins, false otherwise

    • isMotherNatureMoveLegit

      public boolean isMotherNatureMoveLegit(int selectedMotherNatureMove)
      Method isMotherNatureMoveLegit checks if the player can move Mother Nature how much he wants
      Parameters:
      selectedMotherNatureMove - how much the player wants to move Mother Nature
      Returns:
      true if the selected Mother Nature move is legit, false if the selected Mother Nature move is illicit

    • getPlayerChoice

      public PlayerChoice getPlayerChoice()
      Gets the player choice containing all the choices made by the player regarding character cards.
      Returns:
      a PlayerCoice object containing all the player choices.

      public boolean equals(Object o)
